code:
C4Context
    title System Context Diagram - MyFitnessFriend

    Person(user, "User", "Tracks meals, water, workouts, and views progress")

    System(mff, "MyFitnessFriend", "Fitness & nutrition tracking platform for web and mobile")

    System_Ext(clerk, "Clerk", "Google OAuth identity provider, JWT issuance")
    System_Ext(foodApi, "Food Database API", "External food/nutrition data (e.g., Edamam)")

    Rel(user, mff, "Logs meals, water, workouts; views diary & streaks")
    Rel(mff, clerk, "Validates JWT tokens, retrieves user identity")
    Rel(mff, foodApi, "Searches foods, resolves barcodes")
    Rel(user, clerk, "Authenticates via Google OAuth")
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
